attributes.comment:
I urge CMS to reject this proposal. Patients, female and male, have human rights and deserve to know the sex of the provider giving care.

Women's human and sex based rights entitle them to the dignity and choice to choose and interact with other humans based on their own decisions. One determinant may be the sex of the provider.

I hope that CMS does not embrace gender ideology which is harmful to girls, women and children.

REJECT THIS PROPOSAL. It is not good healthcare at all

attributes.title: Comment on CMS-2022-0163-0001
